page.title: 19TRANSPORT : SWANSEA WEST
page.content: 1)Public:there are no railway stations in our area,the nearest being at Swansea High St. Buses run to/from the Quadrant Bus Stn. in the city centre. There are routes to Gower along A4118; buses to Penlan,Waunarlwydd & parts of West Wales operate via A4216.Ambulance services to Singleton,Hill House and Cefn Coed Hospitals are often seen. 2)Private:most families have a car, & some have more than one. Motorcycles & scooters are popular, especially with young people. 3)Sample road traffic survey on A4118, 8.30_8.40 a.m.:_ to Swansea:cars 162,vans 13,buses 5, lorries 2,motorbikes 10, cars & trailers 2, pedestrians 58(including 51 school children).
